distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for xorg-x11-server fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-0494: Fixed a use-after-free in DeepCopyPointerClasses (bsc#1207783).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in X.Org. This issue occurs due to a dangling pointer in DeepCopyPointerClasses that can be exploited by ProcXkbSetDeviceInfo() and ProcXkbGetDeviceInfo() to read and write into freed memory. This can lead to local privilege elevation on systems where the X server runs privileged and remote code execution for ssh X forwarding sessions.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
